name: StructsAndGroups
description: Defines the structure of the extracted WGSL structs and groups.

properties.name: wgsl
group
properties.type:
parseInt(item.match(groupPattern)[1], 10),
        binding: parseInt(item.match(bindingPattern)[1], 10),
        name: item.match(namePattern)[2],
        isUniform: item.match(namePattern)[1] === '<uniform>',
        type: item.match(typePattern)[1],
    }))

properties.name: acc
